metadata.dc:author: Vara Thorbeck, C
Herrainz, R
Salvi Martínez, M
Toscano Méndez, R
metadata.dc:description: Lymphangiomas are benign tumors of the lymphatic system. Their abdominal location is infrequent. We report two cases, one in the first jejunal loop and the other one in the mesentery. The latter was removed by laparoscopic surgery, technique that allows a wider resection.
metadata.dc:title: Linfagiomas quísticos intestinales.
[Intestinal cystic lymphangiomas].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista espanola de enfermedades digestivas : organo oficial de la Sociedad Espanola de Patologia Digestiva
